Strings.Msg: IMPORTANT: The hard drives in this configuration are template sized. If you need a business data disk, please add a second hard disk after the deployment is completed. The resource configuration is as follows: * 2 vCPU * 4GB RAM * 100GB Storage

IMPORTANT: The hard drives in this configuration are template sized. If you need a business data disk, please add a second hard disk after the deployment is completed. The resource configuration is as follows: * 4 vCPU * 8GB RAM * 100GB Storage

IMPORTANT: The hard drives in this configuration are template sized. If you need a business data disk, please add a second hard disk after the deployment is completed. The resource configuration is as follows: * 4 vCPU * 16GB RAM * 100GB Storage

IMPORTANT: The hard drives in this configuration are template sized. If you need a business data disk, please add a second hard disk after the deployment is completed. The resource configuration is as follows: * 6 vCPU * 24GB RAM * 100GB Storage

IMPORTANT: The hard drives in this configuration are template sized. If you need a business data disk, please add a second hard disk after the deployment is completed. The resource configuration is as follows: * 12 vCPU * 48GB RAM * 100GB Storage

IMPORTANT: The hard drives in this configuration are template sized. If you need a business data disk, please add a second hard disk after the deployment is completed. The resource configuration is as follows: * 16 vCPU * 64GB RAM * 100GB Storage
The IPv4 Address for the VM.(e.g. 192.168.10.100)
The IPv4 Netmask for the VM.(e.g. 255.255.255.0)
The default IPv4 gateway for the VM.(eg. 192.168.10.1)
The DNS server list for this VM.(Space separated,eg. 192.168.10.1 192.168.10.2)
The Domain search list for this VM.(Space separated,eg. corp.local corp.com)
The NTP server list(Space separated,eg. 192.168.10.10 192.168.10.11) for this VM.
After the system deployment is completed, log in by "cloud-user", it has password-free sudo permissions.
Password to login in as cloud-user. Please use a secure password
Disable remote login for Root user
To improve security, Root remote access is disabled by default, but you can undisable it.
重要信息：此配置中的硬盘驱动器是模板大小的。 如果您需要业务数据盘，请在部署完成后添加第二块硬盘。 资源配置如下： * 2 vCPU * 4GB 内存 * 100GB 硬盘
重要信息：此配置中的硬盘驱动器是模板大小的。 如果您需要业务数据盘，请在部署完成后添加第二块硬盘。 资源配置如下： * 4 vCPU * 8GB 内存 * 100GB 硬盘
重要信息：此配置中的硬盘驱动器是模板大小的。 如果您需要业务数据盘，请在部署完成后添加第二块硬盘。 资源配置如下： * 4 vCPU * 16GB 内存 * 100GB 硬盘
重要信息：此配置中的硬盘驱动器是模板大小的。 如果您需要业务数据盘，请在部署完成后添加第二块硬盘。 资源配置如下： * 6 vCPU * 24GB 内存 * 100GB 硬盘
重要信息：此配置中的硬盘驱动器是模板大小的。 如果您需要业务数据盘，请在部署完成后添加第二块硬盘。 资源配置如下： * 12 vCPU * 48GB 内存 * 100GB 硬盘
重要信息：此配置中的硬盘驱动器是模板大小的。 如果您需要业务数据盘，请在部署完成后添加第二块硬盘。 资源配置如下： * 16 vCPU * 64GB 内存 * 100GB 硬盘
虚拟机的IPv4子网掩码。(例如. 255.255.255.0)
虚拟机的IPv4默认网关。(例如. 192.168.10.1)
虚拟机的DNS服务器列表。(空格分割多个地址，例如. 192.168.10.1 192.168.10.2)
虚拟机的DNS搜索域列表。(空格分割多个域名，例如. corp.local corp.com)
虚拟机NTP服务器列表。(空格分割多个地址，例如. 192.168.10.10 192.168.10.11)
系统部署完成后，通过“cloud-user”用户登录，其具有免密sudo权限。
设置“cloud-user”的密码，轻使用复杂密码。
为提升安全性，默认禁用Root远程访问，你可以取消禁用。
开启Debug，用于排查自动化配置问题。
